title: elastoo
author: elastoo
content: Hello fellows, Ready to service for a high quality development of web/blockchain app services including but not limited to: - REST API endpoints for a website dashboards, SaaS backend, mobile app- vue.js based frontends for web2 and web3 services- develop and launch a full web project (API + frontend)- web3js frontend integrations- web2 and web3 scrapping- GPT3 integrations to your backend services Previously worked with high profile clients from US, UAE and Eastern Europe. Ready to show on demand a running production services. My portfolio includes services and projects from a following topics: - Custodian crypto payment systems such as Coinbase Commerce - full API including crypto processing, blockchain scrapping, website callbacks and web dashboard to manage API keys, personal settings and user activities- Non custodial web3 payments systems based on smart-contracts + backend integration- P2P exchange white label - BTC to ERC20 wrapping platform including the bridge between BTC, ETH and BNB networks - Flutter based mobile app of Ethereum walletBasically I will definitely be helpful if you're going to build and launch web2 or web3 startup. I will help to architecture a fast MVP version then scale it to a full version product if a project running well. Please write direct messages or telegram https://t.me/elastoo_dev

comments.author: kritika1290
comments.body: A team of skilled Flutter app developers can assist you in creating platform-independent digital human experiences that transcend device boundaries. We provide professional Flutter development services that enable the creation of dynamic and highly functional applicationsOur Flutter mobile app development Company has empowered numerous businesses to make a strong industry impression.
